metadata.label: Log Info
metadata.description:
Prints info logs.
```ballerina
log:printInfo("info message", id = 845315)
```

metadata.label: Log Error
Log Warn
metadata.description:
Prints warn logs.
```ballerina
log:printWarn("warn message", id = 845315)
```

metadata.label: Log Debug
metadata.description:
Prints debug logs.
```ballerina
log:printDebug("debug message", id = 845315)
```

metadata.label: Schema To JSON
metadata.description: Converts a value of type `anydata` to `json`.

metadata.label: Schema To XML
metadata.description:
Converts a `Map` or `Record` representation to its XML representation.
Additionally, when converting from a record, the `xmldata:Namespace`, `xmldata:Name`, and `xmldata:Attribute`
annotations can be used to add `namespaces`, `name of elements`, and `attributes` to XML representation.

metadata.label: JSON To Schema
metadata.description: Convert value of type `json` to subtype of `anydata`.

metadata.label: XML To Schema
metadata.description: Converts XML to record type with projection.

metadata.label: Evaluate JSON Path
metadata.description:
Extract details from the given JSON value using the provided query template expression.

```ballerina
read({id: 1, "name": "John Doe"}, `$.name`) => "John Doe"
```

metadata.label: JSON Pretty Print
metadata.description: Prettifies a `json` value to print it.

metadata.label: XSLT Transform
metadata.description:
Transforms the single-rooted XML content to another XML/HTML/plain text using XSL transformations.
```ballerina
xml|error target = xslt:transform(sourceXml, xsl);
```

metadata.label: Read CSV
Read JSON
metadata.description:
Reads file content as a JSON.
```ballerina
json|io:Error content = io:fileReadJson("./resources/myfile.json");
```

metadata.label: Read Bytes
metadata.description:
Read the entire file content as a byte array.
```ballerina
byte[]|io:Error content = io:fileReadBytes("./resources/myfile.txt");
```

metadata.label: Read XML
metadata.description:
Reads file content as an XML.
```ballerina
xml|io:Error content = io:fileReadXml("./resources/myfile.xml");
```

metadata.label: Write CSV
Write JSON
Write Bytes
Write XML
